Do you want to allow users to post to the forums? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want users to be able to view forums and manage their subscriptions, but only want certain levels to be able to create forums.

column1: No, do not allow forum posts.

Do you want to allow members to moderate forums?  This permission allows members to tag sticky topics, close an existing topic, and edit or delete any post.

If you have disabled HTML in posts but want to allow specific tags, you can enter them below (separated by commas). If you have enabled HTML in posts, this setting will have no effect.  Example: b, img, a, embed, font
